snippet: The fate of Sarabjit Singh, on death row for espionage, had long been a source of contention between India and Pakistan.
abstract: Sarabjit Singh, Indian man on death row in Pakistan for espionage, dies after being attacked by fellow inmates, prompting angry response from India.

byline.contributor: Waqar Gillani contributed reporting from Multan, and Salman Masood from Islamabad, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: The fate of Sarabjit Singh, on death row for espionage, had long been a source of contention between India and Pakistan.

headline.seo: Indian Prisoner in Pakistan Dies After Beating
headline.main: Indian Prisoner in Pakistan Dies After Beating, Prompting Angry Reply From India
headline.print_headline: Indian Prisoner in Pakistan Dies After Beating, Prompting Angry Reply From India
